## About

Detector automatically finds and downloads video and audio on any webpage â€” from simple MP4 files to complex HLS/DASH streams. Just visit a page, click the icon, and download.

> **Note:** Please respect copyright laws and terms of service when using this extension.

---

## âœ¨ Features

- **170+ supported sites** â€” YouTube, Instagram, Twitter/X, TikTok, Netflix, and many more
- **HLS & DASH** â€” Downloads M3U8 and MPD streams segment-by-segment
- **Stream merging** â€” Combines separate video + audio tracks via built-in WASM (libav)
- **Quality selection** â€” Pick from 360p, 720p, 1080p, and more
- **Auto-detection** â€” No URL pasting needed, media is found automatically
- **Large files** â€” Disk-backed downloads up to 20GB using OPFS
- **Parallel downloads** â€” 4 concurrent segments with automatic retry
- **Real-time progress** â€” Speed, percentage, and ETA shown live
- **Works everywhere** â€” Generic fallback catches media on any site

---

## ğŸ“¥ Installation

1. **Download** or clone this repo
2. Go to `chrome://extensions` (or your browser's equivalent)
3. Enable **Developer mode**
4. Click **Load unpacked** â†’ select the `Detector` folder
5. Pin the extension to your toolbar

---

## ğŸš€ Usage

1. Visit any website with video or audio
2. Click the **Detector** icon
3. Pick your quality and hit download

That's it â€” media is detected automatically.
